events.description: Cardinals challenged (hit by pitch), call on the field was upheld: Ji Hwan Bae hit by pitch.
Bryan Reynolds grounds into a double play, second baseman Brendan Donovan to shortstop Tommy Edman to first baseman Paul Goldschmidt. Ji Hwan Bae out at 2nd. Bryan Reynolds out at 1st. 2 outs
